name: NHL All-Star Hockey 98
overview: NHL All-Star Hockey 98 is a ice hockey game released for the Sega Saturn in 1997. NHL All-Star Hockey 98 was billed as a sequel to NHL All-Star Hockey, but is more of a sequel to Radical Entertainment's earlier release, NHL Powerplay '96. The same game exists on the PlayStation (published by Virgin Interactive) as NHL Powerplay 98.
